## Detailed User Stories

### US-001: User Registration
**As a** new user  
**I want to** register for an account  
**So that** I can access the system  

**Priority**: High  
**Story Points**: 5  
**Sprint**: 1  

**Acceptance Criteria**:
- [ ] User can navigate to registration page
- [ ] All required fields are validated
- [ ] Email verification is sent
- [ ] User receives confirmation
- [ ] Account is created in database

**Technical Notes**:
- Implement email verification
- Store passwords securely (bcrypt)
- Create user profile

---

### US-002: User Login
**As a** registered user  
**I want to** log into the system  
**So that** I can access my personalized content  

**Priority**: High  
**Story Points**: 3  
**Sprint**: 1  

**Acceptance Criteria**:
- [ ] User can enter username/email and password
- [ ] System validates credentials
- [ ] Failed attempts are logged
- [ ] Successful login creates session
- [ ] User is redirected to dashboard

**Technical Notes**:
- Implement session management
- Add "Remember Me" option
- Include password reset link

---

### US-003: Password Reset
**As a** user who forgot their password  
**I want to** reset my password  
**So that** I can regain access to my account  

**Priority**: High  
**Story Points**: 3  
**Sprint**: 1  

**Acceptance Criteria**:
- [ ] User can request password reset
- [ ] Reset link is sent to email
- [ ] Link expires after 24 hours
- [ ] User can set new password
- [ ] Old sessions are invalidated

---

### US-004: User Profile Management
**As a** logged-in user  
**I want to** update my profile information  
**So that** my account details are current  

**Priority**: Medium  
**Story Points**: 5  
**Sprint**: 2  

**Acceptance Criteria**:
- [ ] User can view current profile
- [ ] User can edit profile fields
- [ ] Changes are validated
- [ ] Profile photo can be uploaded
- [ ] Changes are saved to database

---

### US-005: Dashboard View
**As a** logged-in user  
**I want to** see a personalized dashboard  
**So that** I can quickly access relevant information  

**Priority**: High  
**Story Points**: 8  
**Sprint**: 2  

**Acceptance Criteria**:
- [ ] Dashboard displays user-specific data
- [ ] Widgets are customizable
- [ ] Real-time updates are shown
- [ ] Quick actions are available
- [ ] Performance metrics are visible

---

### US-006: Search Functionality
**As a** user  
**I want to** search for content  
**So that** I can quickly find what I need  

**Priority**: Medium  
**Story Points**: 5  
**Sprint**: 3  

**Acceptance Criteria**:
- [ ] Search bar is prominently displayed
- [ ] Auto-complete suggestions appear
- [ ] Results are relevant and ranked
- [ ] Filters can be applied
- [ ] Search history is maintained

---

### US-007: Data Export
**As a** user  
**I want to** export my data  
**So that** I can use it in other applications  

**Priority**: Low  
**Story Points**: 3  
**Sprint**: 4  

**Acceptance Criteria**:
- [ ] Export options are available
- [ ] Multiple formats supported (CSV, PDF, Excel)
- [ ] Data is properly formatted
- [ ] Large exports are handled efficiently
- [ ] Download link is provided

---

### US-008: Notifications
**As a** user  
**I want to** receive notifications  
**So that** I stay informed about important events  

**Priority**: Medium  
**Story Points**: 5  
**Sprint**: 3  

**Acceptance Criteria**:
- [ ] In-app notifications appear
- [ ] Email notifications can be configured
- [ ] Notification preferences are saved
- [ ] Notifications can be marked as read
- [ ] History is maintained

---

### US-009: Admin User Management
**As an** administrator  
**I want to** manage all user accounts  
**So that** I can maintain system security  

**Priority**: High  
**Story Points**: 8  
**Sprint**: 2  

**Acceptance Criteria**:
- [ ] Admin can view all users
- [ ] Users can be activated/deactivated
- [ ] Roles can be assigned
- [ ] Password resets can be triggered
- [ ] Activity logs are visible

---

### US-010: Reporting Dashboard
**As a** manager  
**I want to** view comprehensive reports  
**So that** I can make data-driven decisions  

**Priority**: Medium  
**Story Points**: 13  
**Sprint**: 4  

**Acceptance Criteria**:
- [ ] Multiple report types available
- [ ] Date ranges can be selected
- [ ] Charts and graphs are interactive
- [ ] Reports can be exported
- [ ] Custom reports can be created
